your request for Trigger➛Loaner Request Record➛Item type

is sent and confirm the start and end dates which areTrigger➛Loaner Request Record➛Start date and Trigger➛Loaner Request Record➛End date at the depot Trigger➛Loaner Request Record➛Depot
